channel.title: Character Restart
channel.description: Okay, on [b]every[/b] server I go onto, if I am to log out\dc or whatever may happen that logs me out, I get restarted. This happens on EVERY server I go onto. It seems like I'm the only one with this problem.. Little help, please?

item.title: Character Restart
item.dc:creator: @CryptoScape CryptoScape
item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

[quote=“b3nny, post:1, topic:8902”]Okay, on every server I go onto, if I am to log out\dc or whatever may happen that logs me out, I get restarted. This happens on EVERY server I go onto. It seems like I’m the only one with this problem… Little help, please?[/quote]are u using moparscape 2
or does ure pc lag ?
